name: Neurology
desc: Neurology is the branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of disorders of the nervous system.

name: Ophthalmology
desc: Ophthalmology is a branch of medicine and surgery that deals with the diagnosis and treatment of disorders of the eye.

name: Surgical
desc: Surgery is a medical or dental specialty that uses operative manual and instrumental techniques on a person to investigate or treat a pathological condition

name: Dental
desc: The field of dentistry or dental medicine includes teeth as well as other aspects of the craniofacial complex

name: Cardiology
desc: Cardiology is the study and treatment of disorders of the heart and the blood vessels. A person with heart disease or cardiovascular disease may be referred to a cardiologist

name: Psychology
desc: Psychology is the study of the mind and behavior, according to the American Psychological Association. It is the study of the mind, how it works, and how it affects behavior

name: Psychiatry
desc: Psychiatry is the branch of medicine focused on the diagnosis, treatment and prevention of mental, emotional and behavioral disorders.

name: Pathology
desc: Pathology is the medical specialty concerned with the study of the nature and causes of diseases

name: Councelling
desc: Pathology is the medical specialty concerned with the study of the nature and causes of diseases

name: Orthopaedics
desc: Orthopedics is a branch of medicine that focuses on the care of the musculoskeletal system
